parameters.name: filters
parameters.description:
Allowed filters:
**curriculum_id**
_0_ - for courses without an curriculum,
_{curriculum_id}_ - for courses with curriculum curriculum_id,
_[curriculum_id1, curriculum_id2 ...]_ - for courses with curriculums with curriculum_id from array}
**is_archived** - 0|1
**is_active** - 0|1
**years_of_study** - 1|2|3

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search for the curriculums by name or description. Requirements: min 3 symbols

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description:
Allowed filters:
**exclude_courses** _[course_id1, course_id2 ...]_ - for exclude users in courses with id from array

**course_id**

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Allowed fields params: **created_at, status, priority**. Direction: **desc, asc**

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description:
Allowed filters:
**assign_to**
_0_ - for tickets without an assignee,
_{user_id}_ - for tickets assigned to a user with user_id,
_[user_id1, user_id2 ...]_ - for tickets assigned to a users with user_id from array}

post.description: Method revokes the current access token.

message.example: You have been successfully logged out.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search users by search phrase. Requirements: min 3 symbols

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description:
Allowed filters:
**roles**
_[role_name_1, role_name_2 ...]_ - for users with roles name from array
**statuses**
_[status_1, status_2 ...]_ - for users with statuses from array
**is_archived** - 0|1
**curriculums**
_[curr_id_1, curr_id_2 ...]_ - for users with curriculums from array
**exclude_users**
_[user_id_1, user_id_2 ...]_ - to exclude users from array
**courses**
_[course_id_1, course_id_2 ...]_ - for users with courses from array
**religion**
religion:string_religion - user's religion
**religion_type**
religion_type:string_religion_type - user's religion_type
**professions**
_[profession_id_1, profession_id_2 ...]_ - for users with professions from array
